s2.ptxt: Using a union nut wrench, remove the 2 turn pressure tubes.
Using SST, fix the steering link between aluminum plates in a vise, as shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE TIE ROD END SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Place matchmarks on the tie rod end, lock nut and rack end.
Loosen the lock nut and remove the tie rod end and lock nut.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE TIE ROD END SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedures described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE STEERING RACK BOOT CLAMP LH

s2.ptxt: Using pliers and a screwdriver, loosen the clamp.

atten4.ptxt: Mark the RH and LH boots.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the boot.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE STEERING RACK BOOT CLAMP RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedures described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE STEERING RACK BOOT CLIP LH

s2.ptxt: Using pliers, remove the clip.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the boot.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE STEERING RACK BOOT CLIP RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedures described for the LH side.

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver and hammer, unstake the washer.

atten3.ptxt: Do not strike the steering rack.

s2.ptxt: Using a wrench, hold the steering rack (LH side).
Using SST, remove the steering rack end (LH side) from the power steering rack.

atten3.ptxt: Rotate SST in the direction shown in the illustration.

s2.ptxt: Using SST, remove the steering rack end (RH side) from the power steering rack.

atten3.ptxt: Rotate SST in the direction shown in the illustration.

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 claw washers.
Using SST, remove the lock nut.

atten3.ptxt: Rotate SST in the direction shown in the illustration.

s2.ptxt: Using a 24 mm hexagon wrench, remove the rack guide spring cap.
Remove the spring and rack guide.
Remove the 2 bolts.
Pull out the control valve from the rack housing.
Remove the control valve gasket.
Using a screw extractor, remove the 2 union seats from the control valve housing.
Using SST, remove the stopper.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE CYLINDER END STOPPER OIL SEAL

s2.ptxt: Using SST, press out the steering rack and oil seal.

atten3.ptxt: Take care not to drop the steering rack.

s2.ptxt: Remove the oil seal from the steering rack.
Insert a wire 20 mm (0.79 in.) into the vent hole of the steering rack and ensure that the vent hole is not clogged with grease.

atten3.ptxt: If the hole is clogged, the pressure inside the boot will change after it is assembled and the steering wheel is turned.

s-1.ptxt: INSPECT TIE ROD END SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Move the ball joint stud back and forth 5 times as shown in the illustration, before installing the nut.
Using a torque wrench, turn the nut continuously at a rate of 2 to 4 seconds per turn and take the torque reading on the fifth turn.

s-1.ptxt: INSPECT TIE ROD END SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedures described for the LH side.

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, remove the "teflon" ring and O-ring from the steering rack.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the groove of the ring.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE POWER STEERING CYLINDER TUBE OIL SEAL

item.ptxt: Lightly apply MP grease to the tip of SST (09612-07230) and inside of SST (09612-07210 and 09612-07120) before use.
Completely install SST (09612-07120) to SST (09612-07210) to prevent damage to the inside of the rack housing.

s2.ptxt: Insert SST (09612-07210) into the rack housing at an angle until it comes in contact with the power steering cylinder tube oil seal. Install SST (09612-07220) to SST (09612-07210).

atten3.ptxt: Do not damage the inside of the power steering rack housing.

s2.ptxt: Hold SST (09612-07220) and pull SST (09612-07210) to position SST (09612-07120) the inside of the rack housing.

atten4.ptxt: Make sure that SST (09612-07120) is positioned at the chamfered part between the power steering cylinder tube oil seal and the rack housing.

s2.ptxt: Install SST (09612-07240) to SST (09612-07230). Insert the tip of SST (09612-07230) into the service hole of SST (09612-07120) in the rack housing.

item.ptxt: Make sure that SST (09612-07240) is installed to prevent damage to SST (09612-07120).
Do not damage the inside of the rack housing.

s2.ptxt: Install SST (09951-07150) to SST (09612-07230). Using a press, remove the power steering cylinder tube oil seal.

atten3.ptxt: Do not damage the rack housing.

atten4.ptxt: Replace SST (09951-07150) with another of different length from the set if necessary.
